short_summary: The National Research Council Canada seeks to better understand the current state of prefab and off-site construction in Canada.
description: The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking to better understand the current state of prefab and off-site construction in Canada and set baseline for repeatable studies that can be undertaken every 2-3 years to capture trends and gaps in the sector.
duration_in_months: There's no specific duration in months. The contract is expected to start and end at the following dates
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Title
* English: Business Consulting and Change Management Services
* French: Services conseils affaires et gestions des changements

#### Tender Reference
* Reference Number: 23-58127
* Amendment Number: 7
* Date of tender publication: October 16, 2023

#### Closing Date
* Eligible tender submissions close on November 1, 2023, at 14:00 (EST).
* This tender is no longer accepting submissions.

#### Industry Category
* Industry Category: Business and Corporate Management Consultation Services (UNSPSC 80101500)
* Description: Business and Corporate Management Consultation Services.

#### Terms of Contract
* Contract Period: November 6, 2023, to February 29, 2024
* Location of contract: Ottawa, ON, Canada

#### Contact Information
* Procurement Officer:
    + Name: Philippe G. Cléroux
    + Email: [philippe.cleroux@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:philippe.cleroux@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
    + Phone: 613-998-1073
    + Mail: 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0R6, Canada

#### Contract Requirements
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) invites tenderers to provide business consulting and change management services. The main object of this procurement is to understand the current state of prefab and off-site construction in Canada, establish a baseline for repeatable studies and set a reference point for further research and analysis.

#### Important Documents
Available documents may be downloaded from the Canada Buys website:
* Read the Tender Notice Document (.pdf)
* Read the Statement of Work Document (.pdf)

#### Trade Agreements
This RFP is subject to the following trade agreements:
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

#### Disclaimer
This information is subject to the Standard Terms and Conditions of Canada Buys. The Government of Canada is under no obligation
